Essential to Forsake Sin.--Here is where you bring yourself into condemnation, that you continue to sin. In the strength of Christ cease to sin. Every provision has been made that grace should abide with you, that sin shall ever appear the hateful thing that it is, sin. "And if any man sin," he is not to give himself up in despair and talk like a man who is lost to Christ.--Lt 41, 1893.
